
import sys

T = int(raw_input())

while T :

	a , b = map(list,sys.stdin.readline().split())
	
	
	i = 0
	j = len(a) - 1
	
	while i <= j :
		t = a[i]
		a[i] = a[j] 
		a[j] = t
		i+=1
		j-=1
	
	i = 0
	j = len(b)-1
	
	while i<= j :
		t = b[i]
		b[i] = b[j] 
		b[j] = t
		i+=1
		j-=1
	
	a = "".join(a)
	a = int(a)
	b = "".join(b)
	b = int(b)
	
	a+=b
	
	a = list(str(a))
	
	i = 0
	j = len(a) - 1
	
	while i <= j :
		t = a[i]
		a[i] = a[j] 
		a[j] = t
		i+=1
		j-=1
	
	a = "".join(a)
	a = int(a)
	print a
	T-=1
